text: a frequent question I get asked by
customers is which workload or which
application do I start with when it
comes to this journey to the cloud and I
always like to say start with something
critical workload or application but not
your least used application start with
that you experiment with a pattern that
is well utilized well seen well observed
by your stakeholders and users around
the world but also one that is important
enough to give you the knowledge and
learnings that you can use again so ship
